      public boolean isAgentDown()
      Decrements health points if the agent has been hit
      Returns:
      false if the agent is still alive, or true otherwise

    • isReadyToLeave

      public boolean isReadyToLeave​(boolean hasTarget)
      Checks if the agent has the target and is on an exit floor
      Parameters:
      hasTarget -
      Returns:
      true if the agent is ready to leave, false if not in an exit floor/ doesn't have the target
